name: Default Tweaks
description: A set of safe, recommended optimizations for most devices.
author: AuroraBridge

categories.name: UI & Animation
categories.description: Tweaks to make the user interface feel faster and more responsive.

commands.name: Reduce Animation Scale
commands.description: Speeds up transitions and animations across the system.
commands.command: settings put global window_animation_scale 0.5; settings put global transition_animation_scale 0.5; settings put global animator_duration_scale 0.5

commands.name: Disable Transition Animation
commands.description: Disables the animation shown when transitioning between screens.

categories.name: Connectivity
categories.description: Optimizations related to network and data usage.

commands.name: Disable Mobile Data in Roaming
commands.description: Prevents the device from using mobile data when roaming to avoid extra charges.
